name: New Chairwoman to Deliver State of the County Wednesday
description: County Board of Supervisors Chairwoman Nora Vargas will deliver her first State of the County Address on Wednesday, Feb. 1.
keywords: chairwoman of the board of supervisors

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
County Board of Supervisors Chairwoman Nora Vargas will deliver her first State of the County Address on Wednesday, Feb. 1.
The live broadcast of the event starts at 6 p.m. and will be interpreted in American Sign Language.
The broadcast will have live interpretation in Arabic, Chinese, Filipino, Korean, Persian, Somali, Spanish and Vietnamese via Zoom bit.ly/3wjhFlb. The invitation-only event is taking place at a location with limited capacity, the San Diego County Administration Center West Plaza.
The public can watch the address in a variety of ways:

County of San Diego YouTube Page
County of San Diego Facebook Page
County of San Diego Twitter Page  
County of San Diego Vimeo Live Stream Page
cbs8.com Live Stream
CW Network San Diego Live Broadcast
Univision San Diego’s Facebook Page with Spanish interpretation

The address will be rebroadcast on CNC TV on the following dates and times:
2-1-23 – 6 p.m. (Live)
2-3-23 – 8 p.m.
2-4-23 – 1 p.m. & 8 p.m.
2-5-23 – 1 p.m. & 8 p.m.
2-9-23 – 6 p.m.
2-13-23 – 8 p.m.
2-15-23 – 8 p.m.
2-17-23 – 8 p.m.
